name: Black Bow of the Betrayer
rules: When you strike with Black Bow of the Betrayer, your hero has Long-Range this combat. [Hunter]: When an ally is dealt combat damage with Black Bow of the Betrayer, ready up to four of your resources.

name: Blessed Medallion of Karabor
rules: Remove Blessed Medallion of Karabor from the game -> Move to the right of another friendly player. Use only on your turn.
flavour: With the Betrayer defeating, the full potential of this medallion was unlocked.

name: Cursed Vision of Sargeras
rules: [Exhaust] -> If you completed a quest this turn, turn target resource face down.
flavour: Sargeras burned away the Betrayer's eyes to gift him with the vision of the Legion.

name: Memento of Tyrande
rules: When a non-token ally is destroyed, its controller may put a Spirit ally token into play wit 1 [Holy] ATK / 1 health.
flavour: Whatever I may be - whatever I may become in this world - know that I will always look out for you, Tyrande. - Illidan Stormrage

name: Stormrage Signet Ring
rules: [Exhaust] -> Put target equipment into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The symbol of a family bond, now shattered.

name: The Skull of Gul'dan
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less the next time you pay a cost with X in it this turn.
flavour: The essence of Ner'zhul's apprentice seethes within.

name: Warglaive of Azzinoth, Left Hand of the Betrayer
rules: Your hero has dual wield while you have another Warglaive. When Warglaive of Azzinoth leaves play, put a Demon ally token named Flame of Azzinoth into play with 3 [Fire] ATK / 3 health and Ferocity.

name: Warglaive of Azzinoth, Right Hand of the Betrayer
rules: When you strike with Warglaive of Azzinoth, ready another one of your Warglaives. When Warglaive of Azzinoth leaves play, put a Demon ally token named Flame of Azzinoth into play with 3 [Fire] ATK / 3 health and Protector.

name: Zhar'doom, Greatstaff of the Devourer
rules: 1, Exhaust your hero, remove three ability cards in your graveyard from the game -> Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from itself.

name: Illidan Stormrage
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the start of your turn, you may put a Traitor ally card from your collection into play.
flavour: Feel the hatred of ten thousand years!

name: Entry into the Black Temple
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each different class among allies in your party.
flavour: You immediately understand that this is the distraction Akama is waiting for.

name: The Fall of the Betrayer
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If target opposing hero's printed health is more than your hero's, draw a card.
flavour: Every decision Akama made and every moment of his life since Illidan arrived, Akama planned for this moment. - Seer Kanai
